description: Prior Approval (Telecommunications) for removal and replacement of 6no antennas, installation of 3 x 600mm dishes, internal upgrade of existing equipment cabin and ancillary works in order to upgrade the existing equipment to provide 5G mobile service.
decision_conditions:
DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

002 Site location Plan; 215 Max Configuration Site Plan, 265 Max Configuration Elevation, 150 existing elevation A, Declaration of Conformity with ICNIRP Public Exposure Guidelines, Site Specific Supplementary Information- Selkirk House, Digital Infrastructure Product brochure, Covering letter ref: 90027/ISL025/ATAP/MP dated 4 June 2020 produced by Avison Young, Allaying health concerns regarding 5G and exposure to radio waves, Developer's notice 90027/ISL025/ATAP/MP & 5G and future technology- Delivering the Uk's Telecoms Future.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
